name: Cyber Crime Driver
description:
You're a cyber crime driver, a motorbike user who specialises in retrieving and delivering crime to and from the appropriate parties.

Your main enemy: cops! It's their sworn duty to hunt you down and put you behind bars.

It's a turn-based game, where the aim is to get 6 crime briefcases before the cops notice you 6 times! Use your speed and streetwise to stay one step ahead of them - but don't hang around, because more cops will appear the longer you stay at large!

You can move more than one space in a turn!

Made for the 7-day broguelike, 2019, using LÖVE. Graphics are from http://gameicons.net/ and hand-drawn by me in Procreate. SFX is made with Pico-8. Mouse control only.
